content: And I said, yes, I'm ready to go now, can you please call and we have -- it's effectively a 2-way interview with people, just understanding what they're looking for, people understand how the service and the experience will work and the timetable is in there. We'll be rolling -- many will continue with the existing ships as they're in service, but many of those experienced engineers will also transition as planned into our Delta class and new mothership designs. And so that's where I think supply is part of the topic as we talked on an earlier question, just the pace at which we're moving through the engineering drawings to get to the work instructions to allow people to get on the ship as we spread kind of our experienced engineers over 3 shifts versus 1.
